channel.title: ~Dark SalvationX Beta 24/7 VPS Hosted Join Now!
channel.description:
Download Link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/sdgr9m8zen8xemo/DarkSalvationX%20742.jar
Features: Quest Weekly, Monthly, Overall Task System Weekly, Monthly, Achievement System MiniQuest System
Features Liked about Owner: Instant X2 Xp Enable/Disable Grand Exchange buy/sell (All but 2 Buttons Work!) Custom Prestige System (Adding Skiller Prestige System Soon!) Custom Competitionist Cape Requirements! Weekly Updates for Task and Achievements!
Training Systems: High level, Low level, Mid Level Training Locations. Wonderful slayer Locations, and Dungeons, Rifts, and Chaos Tunnels (Adding *Safe* Entrances)
Custom Highly Codded Skilling || Systems Tree Farming Real Rs Farming Livid Farm Build your own house construction!
Things i'm working on.. New Dungeoneering Fixing Construction (Some things you cant build!) Adding more NPCs to the server Working on Chaos Tunnels Fixing ALL Dupes in Grand Exchange! Custom Client World Based Grand Exchange! Working on Slayer Systems! Task, Achievements, and More Quest! Haloween event and much more!
Bosses/Monsters: Frost Dragons Tormented Demons Polypore Dungeon Glacors Jadinkos Kalphite Queen Corporeal Beast King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Revenant's Grotworm Lair Slayer Tower Npc's
Dungeons: Freminnik Dungeon Revenant Cave Tolna's Rift Chaos Tunnels Grotworm Lair Ancient Cavern
Minigames: Fight Pits Fight Caves Fight Kiln Godwars Clan Wars Dominion Tower (Custom Reward System) Warriors Guild Castle Wars Barrows Crucible RFD
Currently adding more..
Pvp Locations: Mage Bank Multi Area Wests Easts Revenenats
